sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Funnel.css' import { IoIosArrowRoundForward, IoIosArrowForward } from 'react-icons/io' import PerfectScrollbar from 'react-perfect-scrollbar' export default function Funnel() { const [funnel, setfunnel] = useState("") const [Response, setResponse] = useState([]) const res = { Tofu: { Reach: 170538.0, Unique_Reach: 4411, Spends: 1577.190948, Session: 3588.0, CTR: 0.0066729996, Demographics: [ { Gender: "female", Sessions: 778.0 }, { Gender: "male", Sessions: 108.0 } ] } } const funnelChange = (e) => { console.log(e.currentStyle) setfunnel(e.target.textContent) } useEffect(() => { setfunnel(Object.keys(res)[0]) setResponse(res) }, []) return ( <>

TOFU

MOFU

BOFU

Conversion

{/*

Top-of-Funnel

Reach –

{res?.Tofu?.Reach?.toLocaleString()}

Unique Reach –

{res?.Tofu?.Unique_Reach?.toLocaleString()}

Spends ($) –

{parseFloat(res?.Tofu?.Spends?.toLocaleString()).toFixed(2)}

Session –

{res?.Tofu?.Session?.toLocaleString()}

CTR % –

{parseFloat(res?.Tofu?.CTR).toFixed(2)}

Demographics –

{res?.Tofu?.Demographics && res?.Tofu?.Demographics.map((val) => { return ( <>
  • {val.Gender} : {val.Sessions?.toLocaleString()}
    • ) })}
    */}
    ) }
